dcterms:description: The TL;DR corpus consists of approximately 3 million content-summary pairs mined from Reddit, used for evaluating abstractive summarization models.
dcterms:title: TL;DR Reddit corpus

dcterms:description: The CNN/Daily Mail corpus contains pairs of online news articles and their summaries, used for evaluating abstractive summarization models.
dcterms:title: CNN/Daily Mail corpus
